Texts.Eng:
An odd and near-"magical" variation of the webber clones. Composed of nothing but abnormal substances and plenty of sugar, their biology is left to be questioned.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Sugar-rich food, can not safely digest meat at all.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.2^reset;, Health x^green;1.1^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Cosmic, +^green;30^reset;% Shadow
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Spider webs
  ^orange;Faintly glows, earns 10% speed when fed sugary food.^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  In ^cyan;cold^reset; biomes: +^green;20^reset;% Physical Resistance, +^green;10^reset;% Speed
  In ^purple;aether^reset; biomes: gain Health x^green;1.05^reset;.

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Staff: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;
  Quarterstaff/Energy Weapons: +^green;3^reset;% Crit Chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  -^red;10^reset;% speed
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Fire, -^red;30^reset;% Poison, -^red;20^reset;% Radiation
